titleStmt.title: A treatise of Gods free grace, and mans free will
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
publicationStmt.date: 1601. And are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls churchybard by Simon Waterson.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of mans free will, and Gods free grace.
Some print show-through; several pages marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
